testgroup.title: Injection warning light ON check

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to ON position using ignition key.

testgroup.question: Does injection warning light (1) come on?

action.ptxt: Go to Injection Warning Light Does Not Come ON with Ignition Switch ON and Engine at Stop:Diesel Engine Model .

testgroup.title: Injection warning light flash check
testgroup.question: Does injection warning light flash on and off continuously in Step 1?

action.ptxt: Check ICM for DTC referring to DTC Check:Diesel Engine Model .
Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:F9Q .

testgroup.title: Injection warning light remain ON check

test1.ptxt: Check if injection warning light remains ON after engine start.

testgroup.question: Does injection warning light remain ON after engine start?

action.ptxt: Go to Injection Warning Light Remains ON after Engine Start:Diesel Engine Model .
Immobilizer control system is in good condition.
